# Documentation Map
This is the knowledge base for AmbiViz.

- [README.md](./README.md): High-level project description, tech stack, and usage instructions.
- [PROJECT_STATE.md](./PROJECT_STATE.md): Current architecture, tech stack, phase status, and recent Git changes.
- [PRP #13](./PRPs/%23%2013.md): Active development track for Head Tracking, Predictive Filtering, and Audio Transport.
- [FAILURE_REPORT_13.md](./FAILURE_REPORT_13.md): Debugging history and current status of Head Tracking implementation.
